How To Grow A Small Agency Into A Billion Dollar Company, Shaan's $15M Miss, And More

My First Million
02 Feb 2023
Episode 414: Shaan Puri (@ShaanVP) and Sam Parr (@TheSamParr) talk about friend of the pod, Andrew Wilkinson's journey from starting a small agency to growing a billion dollar company, Shaan's investment miss, the Scallenge, and more.
